subject: Re: How to get the Connection Pool in my test cases
msgSnippet: Hi Carfield, How will test the connection.With out setting the connection pool in tomcat, can you tell the other way please.If any sample are there with you.
messageBody:
Hi Carfield,

How will test the connection.With out setting the
connection pool in tomcat, can you tell the other way please.If any
sample are there with you. please send me. I am new to the hibernate
and also junit.

Thanks & Regards,
Thanuja.


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Carfield Yim" <carfield@...> wrote:
>
> May be just not use tomcat connection pool? May be
> http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/dbcp/ ??
>
> On 6/12/07, p_thanuja82 <p_thanuja82@...> wrote:
> >
> > Hi All,
> >
> > I am using tomcat connection pool to connect the database and
> > also i am using the hibernate for configuration.
> >
> > How can I get the connection pool in my test cases.Please
> > anybody clarify my doubt.
> >
> > Thanks & Regards,
> > Thanuja.
> >
> >
> >
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
